[Home](./index.md) &gt; [nifty-tou](./nifty-tou.md) &gt; [TariffRate](./nifty-tou.tariffrate.md) &gt; [parse](./nifty-tou.tariffrate.parse.md)

## TariffRate.parse() method

Parse locale string values into a `TariffRate` instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static parse(locale: string, id: string, amount: string, exponent?: string, description?: string): TariffRate;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  locale | string | the locale to parse the <code>amount</code> and <code>exponent</code> string values as |
|  id | string | the identifier |
|  amount | string | the amount, as a number string in the <code>locale</code> locale |
|  exponent | string | _(Optional)_ a base-10 exponent to interpret <code>amount</code> in, as a number string in the <code>locale</code> locale; if not provided then <code>0</code> is assumed |
|  description | string | _(Optional)_ a description |

**Returns:**

[TariffRate](./nifty-tou.tariffrate.md)

the new instance

## Exceptions

TypeError if the amount or exponent can not be parsed as numbers
